name: Tile Connect: Pair Matching
description:
Let's help the images connect to their matching pairs in Tile Connect puzzle game!

If you are a mind game lover, this newest free-to-play Tile Connect may be the game you have been looking for. To become a tile master, your goal is to connect tiles with a great number of pictures in pairs within the time limit. As you remove all tiles on the board, you can pass the level. Play faster and faster to train your brain, your eyes and also your logical thinking. Ready to have a blast with the collection of various images in free tile connect puzzles including cute pets, delicious cakes, colorful flowers, beautiful clothes, etc. You can definitely find your favorite blocks.

KEY FEATURES
- Exciting pair matching adventures for everyone
- Best brain and eye training and time killing game
- A variety of stunning pictures on the tiles which randomly appear level by level
- Thousands of exciting challenges ahead and hundreds of new levels frequently updated
- Magnificent sign map with 20+ Constellations represent each chapter.
- Throwback to Classic Pikachu matching game rules
- Hint and shuffle amazing boosters
- Autosave gameplay when you quit the game
- Play freely both online and offline without wireless connection

HOW TO PLAY
- Beat levels by eliminating all tiles on the board within the limited time
- Tap two identical tiles without the block of the others to connect using no more than 3 lines
- Be careful with the tiles that have a bomb
- Use powerful tools when you encounter difficulties
- Play faster and faster to become tile master

Now come to play this addictive puzzle game, Tile Connect: Pair Matching! Have fun of matching tiles day by day!
